listeningQuestion.question: What did Tony ask the writer to do?

content.editorNotes: 本课讲述了一个关于借钱和付饭钱的小故事，介绍了动词时态和带to的不定式用法。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: I was having dinner at a restaurant when Tony Steele came in.
Tony worked in a lawyer's office years ago, but he is now working at a bank.
He gets a good salary, but he always borrows money from his friends and never pays it back.
Tony saw me and came and sat at the same table.
He has never borrowed money from me.
While he was eating, I asked him to lend me twenty pounds.
To my surprise, he gave me the money immediately.
'I have never borrowed any money from you,' Tony said, 'so now you can pay for my dinner!'

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 我正在一家饭馆吃饭，托尼·斯蒂尔走了进来。
托尼曾在一家律师事务所工作，而现在正在一家银行上班。
他的薪水很高，但他却总是向朋友借钱，并且从来不还。
托尼看见了我，就走过来和我坐到一张桌子前。
当他吃饭时，我提出向他借20英镑。
令我惊奇的是，他立刻把钱给了我。
'我还从未向你借过钱，'托尼说道，'所以现在你可以替我付饭钱了！'

newwords.heading: New words and expressions 生词和短语

notes.toggle: n. 工资（尤指按月支付的固定工资）

notes.title: 动词时态的运用
notes.content: 本课中出现了多种时态：过去进行时（was having），一般过去时（came in），现在进行时（is working），现在完成时（has never borrowed）等，展示了英语中时态的灵活运用。

notes.title: 动词+名词/代词+带to的不定式
notes.content: 如'I asked him to lend me twenty pounds'中，ask后面可以接名词/代词+带to的不定式，表示请求某人做某事。

notes.title: pay的用法
notes.content: pay可作及物动词也可作不及物动词。pay for表示'为...付钱'，pay back表示'还钱'。

notes.title: work的介词搭配
notes.content: work for强调工作关系，work in/at强调工作地点。如work in a lawyer's office, work at a bank。

notes.context: 表示好事应该得到好的回报
notes.example: I helped him last time, and now he's helping me - one good turn deserves another.
Would you like me to pay for your dinner?
He often borrows money from his friends.
They sat at the same table in the restaurant.

multipleChoice.question: What is Tony's current job?
options: He works in a lawyer's office
multipleChoice.explanation: 课文中明确提到Tony现在在银行工作（he is now working at a bank）。

multipleChoice.question: Why did Tony give the writer money immediately?
options: Because he wanted the writer to pay for his dinner
multipleChoice.explanation: 从故事结尾可以看出，Tony给钱是为了让作者付他的饭钱。

fillInBlanks.sentence: Tony _____ in a lawyer's office years ago.
fillInBlanks.hint: 使用一般过去时，表示过去发生的事情

fillInBlanks.sentence: He _____ borrowed any money from you.
fillInBlanks.hint: 使用现在完成时，表示过去到现在的经历

notes.title: 工资类型辨析
notes.content: 英语中表示工资的词有多种：salary通常指按月支付的固定工资，多指脑力劳动者的收入；wage通常指按小时或按周计算的工资，多指体力劳动者的收入；pay则是一个通用词，可指各种形式的报酬。

notes.title: 英语中的借贷表达
notes.content: 在英语中，borrow表示借入，lend表示借出。这两个词的使用反映了动作的方向：borrow强调获取，lend强调给予。在实际交际中，这种区别的准确使用很重要。
